flawed_nl_solution:
The boat had 20 - 3 = <<20-3=19>>19 sheep make it to shore.
3 sheep drowned, so 2 * 3 = <<2*3=6>>6 cows drowned.
10 cows on the boat - 6 drowned = <<10-6=4>>4 cows made it to the shore.
19 sheep + 4 cows + 14 dogs = <<19+4+14=37>>37 animals made it to shore.
#### 37

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
